name: Robodeck
body:
### Robodeck
Sencha 2.0 mobile remote controls a deck.js presentation running on node.js, express.js and socket.io. 

[Fork the project](https://github.com/jessecravens/robodeck/fork_select)

Or clone it:

```
$ git clone git://github.com/jessecravens/robodeck.git

```

### Demo
[robodeck.herokuapp.com](http://robodeck.herokuapp.com/)

### Authors and Contributors
Jesse Cravens (@jdcravens)
Jeffrey Burtoft (@boyofgreen)

### Support or Contact
Jesse Cravens (@jdcravens)
tagline: Sencha mobile remote controls a deck.js presentation running on node.js, express.js and socket.io.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
